entry.title: 백준 - 단지번호붙이기(#2667)
entry.content:
백준 2667번

#BFS를 이용한 풀이
from collections import deque
import sys
input = sys.stdin.readline

N = int(input())
maps = [list(map(int,input().strip())) for _ in range(N)]
visited=[[0]*N for _ in range(N)]
answer=[]

dx = [1,-1,0,0]
dy = [0,0,1,-1]

def bfs(i,j):
    queue = deque([[i,j]])
    count=1
    while queue:
        x,y = queue.popleft()
        for i in range(4):
            nx,ny=x+dx[i],y+dy[i]

            if nx<0 or ny<0 or nx>N-1 or ny>N-1:
                continue
            
            if not visited[nx][ny]:
                if maps[nx][ny]==1:
                    visited[nx][ny]=1
                    count+=1
                    queue.append([nx,ny])
    return count

for i in range(N):
    for j in range(N):
        if not visited[i][j]:
            if maps[i][j]==1:
                visited[i][j]=1
                answer.append(bfs(i,j))

answer.sort()
print(len(answer))
for i in answer:
    print(i)

#DFS를 이용한 풀이
import sys
input = sys.stdin.readline

N = int(input())
maps = [list(map(int,input().strip())) for _ in range(N)]
visited = [[False]*N for _ in range(N)]
answer=[]
dx=[1,-1,0,0]
dy=[0,0,1,-1]

def dfs(x,y):
    global count
    for i in range(4):
        nx,ny=x+dx[i],y+dy[i]
        if nx<0 or ny<0 or nx>N-1 or ny>N-1:
            continue
        if not visited[nx][ny]:
            if maps[nx][ny]==1:
                count+=1
                visited[nx][ny]=True
                dfs(nx,ny)

for i in range(N):
    for j in range(N):
        if not visited[i][j]:
            if maps[i][j]==1:
                visited[i][j]=True
                count=1
                dfs(i,j)
                answer.append(count)
answer.sort()
print(len(answer))
for i in answer:
    print(i)

  • 백준 - 섬의 개수(#4963)
  • 백준 - 치즈(#2638)
  • 백준 - 점프 점프(#11060)
  • 백준 - 나무 자르기(#2805)
  • 백준 - 회의실 배정(#1931)

entry.title: 프로그래머스 - 멀리 뛰기
entry.content:
def solution(n):
    dp = [0]*(n+2)
    dp[1] = 1
    dp[2] = 2
    
    if n>=3:
        for i in range(3,n+1):
            dp[i] = dp[i-1]+dp[i-2]
            
    answer = dp[n]
    return answer%1234567

entry.title: 프로그래머스 - 단어변환
entry.content:
answer=[]

def dfs(begin,target,start,graph,visited,count):
    global answer
    if begin==target:
        answer.append(count)
        return
    
    visited[start]=True
    for i in range(len(graph)):
        if not visited[i]:
            if sum(graph[i][j]!=begin[j] for j in range(len(begin)))==1:
                dfs(graph[i],target,i,graph,visited,count+1)
                
def solution(begin, target, words):
    if not target in words:
        return 0
    
    for i in range(len(words)):
        if sum(words[i][j]!=begin[j] for j in range(len(begin)))==1:
            visited=[False]*len(words)
            dfs(words[i],target,i,words,visited,1)
            
    if not answer:
        return 0
    else:
        return min(answer)

  • 백준 - 섬의 개수(#4963)
  • 백준 - 치즈(#2638)
  • 백준 - 점프 점프(#11060)
  • 백준 - 나무 자르기(#2805)
  • 백준 - 회의실 배정(#1931)

    global answer
    if begin==target:

    if not target in words:
        return 0
    
    for i in range(len(words)):
        if sum(words[i][j]!=begin[j] for j in range(len(begin)))==1:
            visited=[False]*len(words)
            dfs(words[i],target,i,words,visited,1)
            
    if not answer:
        return 0
    else:
        return min(answer)

entry.title: 프로그래머스 - 기능개발
entry.content:
import math
from collections import deque

def solution(progresses, speeds):
    days = []
    answer=[]
    
    for i in range(len(progresses)):
        days.append(math.ceil((100-progresses[i])/speeds[i]))

    queue = deque([])
    count=0
    
    for i in range(len(days)):
        if not queue:
            queue.append(days[i])
            
        elif queue[0]<days[i]:
            queue.popleft()
            queue.append(days[i])
            answer.append(count)
            count=0
            
        count+=1
    answer.append(count)
    return answer

  • 백준 - 섬의 개수(#4963)
  • 백준 - 치즈(#2638)
  • 백준 - 점프 점프(#11060)

entry.title: 백준 - 나무 자르기(#2805)
entry.content:
백준 2805번

import sys
input = sys.stdin.readline

N,M = map(int,input().split())
namu = list(map(int,input().split()))
cutting = 0

def binarySearch(array,start,end,target):
    if start>end: 
        return
    global cutting

    mid = (end+start)//2
    cut = 0
    for i in array:
        if i>mid:
            cut+=i-mid

    if cut<target:
        binarySearch(array,start,mid-1,target)
        
    else:
        cutting = mid
        binarySearch(array,mid+1,end,target)

binarySearch(namu,0,max(namu),M)
print(cutting)

  • 백준 - 섬의 개수(#4963)
  • 백준 - 치즈(#2638)
  • 백준 - 점프 점프(#11060)

entry.title: 프로그래머스 - 짝지어 제거하기
entry.content:
def solution(s):
    answer=1
    stack = []
    
    for i in s:
        if stack and i==stack[-1]:
            stack.pop()
            continue
            
        stack.append(i)
            
    if stack:
        answer=0
        
    return answer

  • 백준 - 섬의 개수(#4963)

entry.title: 프로그래머스 - 주차 요금 계산
entry.content:
from collections import defaultdict
import math
def solution(fees, records):
    answer = []
    info = defaultdict(lambda: [])
    
    for i in records:
        a = i.split()
        info[a[1]].append(a[0])
        
    info = [x[1] for x in sorted(info.items(),key=lambda x: int(x[0]))]
    
    for i in info:
        fee = fees[1]
        time = 0
        
        if len(i)%2!=0:
            i.append("23:59")
            
        for j in range(0,len(i),2):
            start = int(i[j][:2])*60 + int(i[j][-2:])
            end = int(i[j+1][:2])*60 + int(i[j+1][-2:])
            time += end-start
            
        if time>fees[0]:
            fee += math.ceil((time-fees[0])/fees[2])*fees[3]
            
        answer.append(fee)
        
    return answer

  • 백준 - 섬의 개수(#4963)
  • 백준 - 치즈(#2638)
  • 백준 - 점프 점프(#11060)
  • 백준 - 나무 자르기(#2805)
  • 백준 - 회의실 배정(#1931)

entry.title: 프로그래머스 - 여행경로
entry.content:
from collections import defaultdict
def solution(tickets):
    airports = defaultdict(list)
    for x,y in tickets:
        airports[x].append(y)
        
    for i in airports.values():
        i.sort()

    stack = ["ICN"]
    route = []

    while stack:
        tail = stack[-1]

        if airports[tail]:
            stack.append(airports[tail].pop(0))

        else:
            path.append(stack.pop())

    return route[::-1]

  • 백준 - 섬의 개수(#4963)

entry.title: 프로그래머스 - 올바른 괄호
entry.content:
#DFS를 이용한 풀이
def dfs(v,visited,graph):
    for i in graph[v]:
        if not visited[i]:
            visited[i]=True
            dfs(i,visited,graph)

def solution(n, computers):
    answer = 0
    graph = [[] for _ in range(n)]
    visited = [False] * n
    
    for i in range(n):
        for j in range(len(computers[i])):
            if computers[i][j]!=0 and i!=j:
                graph[i].append(computers[i][j]*j)
    
    present=sum(visited)
    for i in range(n):
        visited[i]=True
        dfs(i,visited,graph)
        if present!=sum(visited):
            present=sum(visited)
            answer+=1
            
    return answer

#BFS를 이용한 풀이
from collections import deque

def bfs(v,nodes,visited,computers): 
    queue = deque([[v,nodes]])

    while queue:
        node = queue.popleft()
        visited[node[0]] = True

        for i in range(len(node[1])):
            if node[1][i]==1 and visited[i]==False:
                visited[i] = True
                queue.append([i,computers[i]])

def solution(n, computers):
    answer = 0

    visited = [False]*n

    for i in range(n):
        if not visited[i]:
            current_sum = sum(visited)

            bfs(i,computers[i],visited,computers)

            if sum(visited)!=current_sum:
                answer+=1
            
    return answer

  • 백준 - 섬의 개수(#4963)
  • 백준 - 치즈(#2638)
  • 백준 - 점프 점프(#11060)
  • 백준 - 나무 자르기(#2805)
